code.name: Base Unit or Each
code.description: The lowest level of the item hierarchy intended or labeled for individual resale.

code.name: Case
code.description: A standard trade item shipping unit that contains a single or multiple GTINs. Includes an ½ or ¼ pallet and an ½ or ¼ box pallet.

code.name: Display Shipper
code.description: A display, a shipper. May have a “PL” parent. May have (CA or EA) children in multiple instances. It may be Orderable and can be a Consumer Unit.

code.name: Mixed Module
code.description: A unit load that is a “display ready pallet” that may contain a single GTIN or several unique GTINs that is intended to go directly to the selling floor

code.name: Pack or Inner Pack
code.description: A logistical unit between case and each. This may be a consumable innerpack (i.e. Carton of Cigarettes) or it may be simply a logistical pack (i.e. Dozes of toothbrushes).

code.name: Pallet
code.description: A unit load that contains a single or multiple GTINs Includes box pallet

code.name: Transport Load
code.description: Trade item above the pallet level used for transporting trade items. For example truck load, container, rail car, ship, etc.
